## 339. HEART
### Definition
A muscular organ that pumps blood through the body. (Concepticon) Both of humans and animals. Understood as a body part rather than in any abstract sense (‘heart’ as a vessel for one’s mind or soul). (GLD)

### Contexts
1. He cut the heart out of the carcass.  2. A human heart is larger than a dog’s heart. 3. Blood flows from the heart.
